Xander Fiyak Gamedev
Main Levels Games

About

I am a (as of writing this) a Junior in college working on a bachelor's in Computer Science.
I have worked on making multiplayer maps for Insurgency's Operator Mod since 2019.
These maps where made using the Valve Hammer Editor for the Source Engine.
I additionally have made games using the Godot Game Engine, and one using Unreal Engine 4.
Additonally, I know multiple programming languages, algorithms, and some database work.
